Posted By: Eric
I am offering up some of my cards for sale. Please check out the link below.

Some great T-206's and a T213-3 (factory 8 overprint). I also have some E-cards listed.

Prices includes shipping.

Looking for check or money order.

Email me at: crazylocomerk@yahoo.com

Emails have priority. First to contact me with intent to purchase gets the card(s). If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask.

Thanks for looking.

I would also use any of the cards listed (that haven't sold) to trade for a T206 HOFer with a DRUM back.  I also have a T206 Warhop with a Drum back only for trade towards a T206 HOFer with a DRUM back.


[url]http://s282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/For%20Sale%20or%20Trade[/url]/
